about.title: About Apex Electric
about.body: Since 2008, Apex Electric Solutions has been the trusted name in electrical services for residential and commercial clients. Our team of licensed master electricians brings decades of combined experience, cutting-edge knowledge, and unwavering commitment to safety. We're fully licensed, insured, and bonded, and we stand behind every job with industry-leading warranties.
about.subtitle: Why choose us

items.text: Had an electrical emergency at 11pm and Apex was here within an hour! Professional, knowledgeable, and fixed the problem quickly. Highly recommend for emergency service!
items.author: Michael Chen

items.text: Upgraded our electrical panel and installed an EV charger. The work was clean, professional, and exactly on schedule. Fair pricing and excellent communication throughout.
items.author: Sarah Martinez

items.text: We use Apex for all our commercial properties. Always reliable, code-compliant work, and they handle inspections seamlessly. True professionals!
items.author: David Thompson

members.name: James Patterson
members.title: Owner & Master Electrician
members.bio: With 20 years of experience and a master electrician license, James founded Apex to provide top-tier electrical services with integrity and professionalism.

members.name: Robert Chen
members.title: Lead Commercial Electrician
members.bio: Robert specializes in commercial electrical systems, data centers, and large-scale projects. His expertise ensures code-compliant, efficient installations.

members.name: Marcus Williams
members.title: Residential Specialist
members.bio: Marcus focuses on residential services from panel upgrades to smart home installations. His attention to detail and customer service are exceptional.

emergency.title: 24/7 Emergency Service
emergency.subtitle: We're here when you need us most
emergency.description: Electrical emergencies can't wait. Our emergency response team is available 24/7/365 to handle urgent electrical issues. We guarantee response within 60 minutes for emergency calls.

serviceAreas.title: Service Areas
serviceAreas.subtitle: Proudly serving the greater metro area

contact.title: Get Started Today
contact.subtitle: Free estimates on all non-emergency work

items.question: Do you offer emergency service?
items.answer: Yes! We provide 24/7 emergency electrical service with guaranteed response within 60 minutes. Call our emergency line anytime at (555) 901-2345.

items.question: Are you licensed and insured?
items.answer: Absolutely. All our electricians are licensed (State License #EC-12345), and we carry $2M in liability insurance and workers' compensation coverage.

items.question: Do you provide free estimates?
items.answer: Yes, we provide free estimates for all non-emergency work. For emergency service calls, there's a service call fee that includes diagnosis and the first hour of labor.

items.question: How quickly can you schedule non-emergency work?
items.answer: We typically can schedule non-emergency work within 2-3 business days. For urgent (but non-emergency) issues, we often have same-day or next-day availability.

items.question: Do you handle permits and inspections?
items.answer: Yes! We pull all necessary permits and coordinate inspections. Our work is always done to code, and we handle the entire process for you.

items.question: What areas do you serve?
items.answer: We serve the entire metro area and surrounding communities. Check our service areas section or call to confirm we service your location.

items.question: Do you offer financing?
items.answer: Yes, we offer flexible financing options for larger projects like panel upgrades, rewiring, and solar installations. Ask us for details!

items.question: What's your warranty policy?
items.answer: We stand behind our work with industry-leading warranties: 3-10 years on installations depending on the service. All warranties are transferable if you sell your property.
